rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: The entrance hallway designed with a spacious layout and subtle Vastu guidance to ensure positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living room featuring floor-to-ceiling windows offering panoramic views. The design incorporates open spaces and natural light in accordance with local norms and Vastu principles for prosperity.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A dining area adjacent to the living room with a seamless transition between indoor and outdoor space. Flooring follows Vastu guidelines for harmony.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: The kitchen is designed ergonomically with ample counter space and efficient storage. Vastu principles ensure proper placement of the stove and sink to foster balance.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact guest bathroom strategically placed near the entrance for convenience.

rooms.name: Main Bathroom
rooms.description: A master bathroom designed with luxury fixtures and ample space to accommodate family needs, following Vastu placements for health and well-being.
